meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of baryons.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the baryonic matter in the universe.
meanings.sent2: The baryonic particles were observed in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The baryonic soup in the lab bubbled with excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like baryonic stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The baryonic clouds drifted lazily across the sky.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to baryon number.
meanings.sent1: The baryonic charge of the particle was measured accurately.
meanings.sent2: The baryonic conservation law was discussed in class.
meanings.sent3: The baryonic equation danced on the chalkboard.
meanings.sent4: His voice resonated with a baryonic tone of authority.
meanings.sent5: The baryonic balance in the equation was crucial for the calculation.
